verses.text_plain: As the hart panteth after the water brooks, so panteth my soul after thee, O God.
verses.verse_html:
1As the hart panteth after the water brooks, so panteth my soul after thee, O God. ▼
▼ Maschil…: or, A Psalm giving instruction of the sons, etc
 , ▼
▼ panteth: Heb. brayeth

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Maschil…: or, A Psalm giving instruction of the sons, etc
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Maschil…: or, A Psalm giving instruction of the sons, etc

verses.text_plain: My soul thirsteth for God, for the living God: when shall I come and appear before God?
verses.verse_html: 2My soul thirsteth for God, for the living God: when shall I come and appear before God?

verses.text_plain: My tears have been my meat day and night, while they continually say unto me, Where is thy God?
verses.verse_html: 3My tears have been my meat day and night, while they continually say unto me, Where is thy God?

verses.text_plain: When I remember these things, I pour out my soul in me: for I had gone with the multitude, I went with them to the house of God, with the voice of joy and praise, with a multitude that kept holyday.
verses.verse_html: 4When I remember these things, I pour out my soul in me: for I had gone with the multitude, I went with them to the house of God, with the voice of joy and praise, with a multitude that kept holyday.

tokens.text: in me: for I had gone

verses.text_plain: Why art thou cast down, O my soul? and why art thou disquieted in me? hope thou in God: for I shall yet praise him for the help of his countenance.
verses.verse_html:
5Why art thou cast down, O my soul? and why art thou disquieted in me? hope thou in God: for I shall yet praise him for the help of his countenance. ▼
▼ cast: Heb. bowed
 , ▼
▼ praise: or, give thanks
 , ▼
▼ for the…: or, his presence is salvation

footnotes.body_html: ▼ praise: or, give thanks

footnotes.body_text: ▼ for the…: or, his presence is salvation
footnotes.body_html: ▼ for the…: or, his presence is salvation

verses.text_plain: O my God, my soul is cast down within me: therefore will I remember thee from the land of Jordan, and of the Hermonites, from the hill Mizar.
verses.verse_html:
6O my God, my soul is cast down within me: therefore will I remember thee from the land of Jordan, and of the Hermonites, from the hill Mizar. ▼
▼ the hill…: or, the little hill

tokens.text: within me: therefore will I remember

footnotes.body_text: ▼ the hill…: or, the little hill
footnotes.body_html: ▼ the hill…: or, the little hill

verses.text_plain: Deep calleth unto deep at the noise of thy waterspouts: all thy waves and thy billows are gone over me.
verses.verse_html: 7Deep calleth unto deep at the noise of thy waterspouts: all thy waves and thy billows are gone over me.

verses.text_plain: Yet the Lord will command his lovingkindness in the daytime, and in the night his song shall be with me, and my prayer unto the God of my life.
verses.verse_html: 8Yet the Lord will command his lovingkindness in the daytime, and in the night his song shall be with me, and my prayer unto the God of my life.

verses.text_plain: I will say unto God my rock, Why hast thou forgotten me? why go I mourning because of the oppression of the enemy?
verses.verse_html: 9I will say unto God my rock, Why hast thou forgotten me? why go I mourning because of the oppression of the enemy?

verses.text_plain: As with a sword in my bones, mine enemies reproach me; while they say daily unto me, Where is thy God?
verses.verse_html:
10As with a sword in my bones, mine enemies reproach me; while they say daily unto me, Where is thy God? ▼
▼ sword: or, killing

verses.text_plain: Why art thou cast down, O my soul? and why art thou disquieted within me? hope thou in God: for I shall yet praise him, who is the health of my countenance, and my God.
verses.verse_html: 11Why art thou cast down, O my soul? and why art thou disquieted within me? hope thou in God: for I shall yet praise him, who is the health of my countenance, and my God.
